roadmap.title: Strengthen Foundational Knowledge
roadmap.description: Deepen understanding of core AI concepts: Linear Algebra, Probability & Statistics, Calculus, Optimization techniques, and Information Theory. Focus on areas relevant to research interests like LLMs, NLP, and Generative AI.
resources: Textbooks (e.g., "Deep Learning" by Goodfellow et al.)

roadmap.title: Advanced Specializations
roadmap.description: Focus on specialized areas within AI research like LLMs, NLP, RAG, Generative AI, and Time Series Forecasting. Explore advanced topics like Transformer models, Attention mechanisms, and Reinforcement Learning.
resources: Research papers from top conferences (NeurIPS, ICML, ICLR)
Implement and experiment with state-of-the-art models

roadmap.title: Research Projects and Publications
roadmap.description: Engage in independent research projects or contribute to open-source projects related to your research interests.  Target publications in reputable conferences or journals.
resources: Attend conferences and workshops to network and present research

roadmap.title: Build a Strong Portfolio
roadmap.description: Create a portfolio showcasing research projects, publications, code contributions, and any relevant experience.  Highlight the impact and novelty of your work.

roadmap.title: Pursue Advanced Education (Optional)
roadmap.description: Consider pursuing a Master's or PhD degree in Computer Science or a related field to further specialize in AI research. This can provide access to advanced resources, mentorship, and research opportunities.
resources: University programs with strong AI research focus
Research advisors and labs aligned with interests

roadmap.title: Network and Seek Opportunities
roadmap.description: Network with other researchers, attend conferences, and actively seek research positions in academia, industry research labs, or government agencies.
